class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums, k):
        seen = defaultdict(list)
        one_op = []

        for pos in range(len(nums) // 2):
            left = nums[pos]
            right = nums[~pos]

            max_value = max(left, right, k - left, k - right)
            seen[abs(left - right)].append(max_value)
            one_op.append(max_value)

        result = len(nums)
        one_op.sort()

        for delta, max_values in seen.items():
            changes = bisect.bisect_left(one_op, delta)
            changes -= sum(2 if max_value < delta else 1 for max_value in max_values)

            result = min(result, len(nums) // 2 + changes)

        return result
